subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Talbot kept the top-seeded Rangers’ season going in fine fashion when he filled in for the injured Henrik Lundqvist. Now the team hopes it doesn’t have to use him.
snippet: Talbot kept the top-seeded Rangers’ season going in fine fashion when he filled in for the injured Henrik Lundqvist. Now the team hopes it doesn’t have to use him.
